SEARCH
Package edu.monash.fit2099bootcamp

Class MagicLibrary

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099bootcamp.MagicLibrary
public class MagicLibrary extends Object
A class that represents a MagicLibrary. It contains a list of MagicBooks and a User object, and allows the User to interact with the MagicLibrary and its librarians.
Version:
7.4
Author:
Aaron Lam Kong Yew

  • Method Details

    • createBooks

      public void createBooks()
      Creates the books in the MagicLibrary.

    • addLibrarians

      public void addLibrarians()
      Appends new Librarian classes to the MagicLibrary.

    • addActionsToMenu

      public void addActionsToMenu()
      Collects all possible actions that can be performed, and displays them as a text based-menu. The user will select one from the available options.

    • printStatus

      public void printStatus()
      Prints the status of the MagicLibrary. Initializes the books and adds actions to the menu.
